alert.note: Alert for Boone; Carroll; Gallatin; Grant; Kenton; Owen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, SWITZERLAND, CARROLL, SOUTHERN KENTON, BOONE, NORTHWESTERN GRANT, NORTHWESTERN OWEN AND GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 616 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Carrollton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph, penny size hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Independence, Carrollton, Walton, Rising Sun, Oakbrook, Burlington, Union, Crittenden, Vevay, Warsaw, Kentucky Speedway, French, Glencoe, Fairview, Ghent, Sanders, Sparta, Patriot and Worthville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Carroll; Gallatin; Grant; Kenton; Owen
